description:
This course is a back to the basics guide to weight loss and weight management. 

The methods and principles described herein are not new...they are just simplified, straightforward, and utterly doable.

If you want to learn to lose and manage weight with mathematical certainty...this is the course for you. 

This course is not flashy. It's not techy. Its main goal is simply to de-mystify weight loss once and for all.
title: Learn to lose weight once...and manage your weight forever.
